[{"type":"text/html","content":"

Actor Jeffrey Tambor comes to terms with a catch-phrase … Perfume Genius really wants you to care as much about these songs as he does … Quincy Jones shares what he learned from jazz man Clark Terry … What a jar of baby food teaches us about society … Edgar Allan Poe’s creepy demise – and mysterious visitor … Bob Odenkirk is so anxious his stomach is in knots (but it’s working for him) … Time off before you clock-in … The angry, mid-meal text message the Posts think you should send … And a new single from Kendrick Lamar …

"},{"content":"
","type":"text/html"}]
title: Episode 273: Jeffrey Tambor, Perfume Genius, and Quincy Jones
description: Actor Jeffrey Tambor comes to terms with a catch-phrase … Perfume Genius really wants you to care as much about these songs as he does … Quincy Jones shares what he learned from jazz man Clark Terry … What a jar of baby food teaches us about society … Edgar Allan Poe’s creepy demise – […]
contentencoded: Actor Jeffrey Tambor comes to terms with a catch-phrase … Perfume Genius really wants you to care as much about these songs as he does … Quincy Jones shares what he learned from jazz man Clark Terry … What a jar of baby food teaches us about society … Edgar Allan Poe’s creepy demise – and mysterious visitor … Bob Odenkirk is so anxious his stomach is in knots (but it’s working for him) … Time off before you clock-in … The angry, mid-meal text message the Posts think you should send … And a new single from Kendrick Lamar …
